Testimony from retired Air Force lieuten: who claimed in a video that US special forces seized Nancy Pelosi's laptop during the storming of the Capitol.
Multiple appearances of the claim on soc: Twitter, and YouTube, as well as in online articles, including one from InfoWars.
Verification from the US Special Operati: both of which stated that they had no knowledge or reports of any special forces involvement in the theft of Pelosi's laptop.
Confirmation from Pelosi: s deputy chief of staff, Drew Hammill, who stated that a laptop stolen from a conference room was only used for presentations, refuting the claim that it contained sensitive data.
